recipes.label: Udon noodle soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 vegetable stock cube
50ml teriyaki sauce
1 tbsp vegetable oil
140g chestnut mushroom, sliced
½ bunch spring onions, thinly sliced
140g udon noodle
200g bag spinach

recipes.label: Noodle Kugel recipes
recipes.ingredients:
1 pound wide egg noodles
2 8-ounce packages cream cheese, softened
1 pound (16 ounces) creamed cottage cheese, full fat
1 1/2 cups sugar
1 stick salted butter, melted, plus more for greasing the baking dish
8 eggs
2 teaspoons vanilla
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1 cup dried cherries

recipes.label: Pomelo Noodle Salad
recipes.ingredients:
6 ounces dried somen, or soba noodles
8 ounces shelled edamame
2 big handfuls salad or micro greens
scant ½ teaspoon toasted sesame oil
a few tablespoons of ponzu sauce, to taste
2/3 cup chopped toasted peanuts
½ a medium pomelo, segments
Topping: garlic or chive flowers, or chopped chives

recipes.label: Chicken Noodle Soup recipes
recipes.ingredients:
One 3 1/2-pound chicken, cut into parts—breast, thighs, backs, wings and neck (if available)
5 carrots (2 carrots scrubbed clean, but not peeled, cut into 2 inch chunks for the stock, 3 carrots peeled and cut into 1/4-inch rounds for the soup)
5 ribs of celery (2 ribs cut into 2 inch pieces for the stock, 3 ribs cut into 1/4-inch thick slices for the soup), including celery tops for the stock
1 onion, quartered (for stock, peel on is okay)
3 cloves of garlic, peel on, cut in half
2 to 3 sprigs of fresh thyme (or a teaspoon of dried)
1 bunch of parsley
5 whole peppercorns
salt
8 to 12 ounces of egg noodles (depending on how noodle-y you want your soup)
ground black pepper

recipes.label: Skillet Noodle Pizza
recipes.ingredients:
8 c. water
4 package any flavor ramen noodle soup
1 tbsp. olive oil
1 c. spaghetti sauce
4 oz. mozzarella cheese
17 slice pepperoni
½ tsp. dried oregano

recipes.label: Noodle Kugel
recipes.ingredients:
1 pound dried wide egg noodles
1 stick (1/2 cup) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1 cup whole milk
5 large eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 cup sugar
2 teaspoons vanilla
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 (1-pound) container sour cream
1 (1-pound) container small curd cottage cheese (4% fat)
1 (20-ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained
2 cups cornflakes, coarsely crushed
2 tablespoons sugar
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into bits

recipes.label: Noodle Kugel
recipes.ingredients:
1 pound broad egg noodles

1/2 cup sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla
7 large eggs
1 pint (2 cups) sour cream
1/4 cup sugar
1 teaspoon cinnamon
4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened

recipes.label: Korean cold noodle salad
recipes.ingredients:
4 tablespoons water
3 tablespoons light soy sauce
1 tablespoon sugar
3 tablespoons cider vinegar

1 ripe kiwi
1 teaspoon chili paste
2 tablespoons chopped scallions
2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
1 tablespoon fish sauce
3 cups boiled noodles (can use any that you like, soba, rice noodles, mung bean noodles, etc)
0.5 cups julienned romaine
0.5 cups julienned carrots
0.5 cups julienned egg (beat 2 eggs, pour into an hot oiled none stick pan. remove from the pan when the egg is set and julienne the cooked egg)
0.5 cups julienned ham

recipes.label: Noodle Bowl
recipes.ingredients:

recipes.label: Buckwheat-Noodle Salad

1 small red chilli , sliced
a pinch sugar

recipes.label: Veggie noodle pot
recipes.ingredients:
100g noodles (rice, soba or egg)
3 tbsp frozen peas
handful sugar snap peas or mangetout, halved lengthways
handful baby corn, halved lengthways
1 spring onion, sliced
½ red pepper, deseeded and chopped
1 tbsp reduced-salt soy sauce
1 tsp clear honey
½ garlic clove, crushed
juice ½ lemon
grating of fresh ginger (optional)
1 tbsp olive oil
splash of milk
2 eggs, beaten

recipes.label: Japanese noodles with sesame dressing
recipes.ingredients:
200g soba noodle
100g sugar snap pea, halved lengthways
1 red pepper, deseeded and thinly sliced
½ cucumber, sliced or peeled into ribbons
2 tsp sesame seed, toasted
2 tbsp tahini paste
2 tbsp soy sauce
2 tbsp rice vinegar
1 tbsp sugar

recipes.label: 15-Minute Noodle Supper
recipes.ingredients:
2.0 tbsp soy sauce
4 peppered smoked mackerel fillets, broken into large flakes
small knob of fresh root ginger , grated
1/2 cucumber , halved then sliced
1 large garlic clove , crushed
bunch of spring onions , sliced
250.0g pack of medium rice noodles
handful of coriander leaves

recipes.label: Shirataki Vegetable Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 package shirataki fettuccine noodles, such as Nasoya Pasta Zero
2 Cups reduced sodium vegetable broth
½ Cup chopped carrots
½ Cup chopped green beans
¼ Cup chopped onions
¼ Cup chopped celery
Salt and pepper

recipes.label: Asian Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
5 cups low-sodium chicken broth
1 teaspoon dried lemongrass
1 2-inch piece of ginger, cut in half
4 ounces dry rice noodles
1/2 cup shiitake or cremini mushrooms, thinly sliced
2 scallions, trimmed and thinly sliced (white and light green parts only)
1 cup fresh bean sprouts
1/2 cup fresh basil leaves
hot chili oil (optional)

recipes.label: Easy noodle soup
recipes.ingredients:
500ml low salt vegetable stock (from a cube is fine)
small piece fresh root ginger, grated
1 garlic clove, grated
2 tsp soy sauce and 2 tsp sugar
85g leftover cooked chicken, shredded
handful mixed vegetables (try beansprouts, sweetcorn, sliced carrot and mangetout)
150g pack straight-to-wok noodles (or use 85g/3oz dried, cooked according to pack instructions)
2 spring onion, sliced, to serve
juice 1 lime

recipes.label: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 tsp chopped fresh root ginger
mint or basil leaves and a little shredded chilli (optional), to serve
2 spring onions , shredded
2 tsp soy sauce , plus extra for serving
2-3 mushrooms , thinly sliced
900.0ml chicken or vegetable stock (or Miso soup mix)
50.0g rice or wheat noodles
2 tbsp sweetcorn , canned or frozen
1 boneless, skinless chicken breast, about 175g/6oz
1 garlic clove , finely chopped

recipes.label: Chinese noodles with tofu & hazelnuts
recipes.ingredients:
250g packet medium egg noodle
2 tbsp olive oil
handful coriander, roughly chopped
300g mangetout
1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped
handful toasted hazelnuts, roughly chopped
349g pack silken tofu, cut into cubes
3 tbsp Chinese yellow bean sauce

recipes.label: Coconut Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
100 g vermicelli rice noodles
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
1 tablespoon finely chopped coriander (cilantro) root
2 cloves garlic, crushed
2 green onions (scallions), sliced
1 large red chilli, seeded and sliced
2 x 400 ml cans coconut milk
¼ cup finely sliced bamboo shoots
100 g green beans, halved and blanched
100 g snow peas (mange tout), blanched
½ cup coriander (cilantro) leaves

recipes.label: Quick Noodle Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 (8-ounce) package pad Thai-style rice noodles or whole wheat linguine
1/2 cup chopped green onions
1 cup mung bean sprouts
1 large carrot, grated
1/4 cup chopped roasted and salted peanuts
1/4 cup chopped cilantro
1/2 cup prepared peanut sauce or Asian salad dressing
Salt
1 (8-ounce) package baked tofu, cut into small cubes

recipes.label: Seafood Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
50 g dried egg noodles
100 g mushrooms (chestnut are good, but any will do), sliced
1 tsp fish sauce
25 g squid rings
100 g mange tout, halved
50 g cooked mussels
chilli to taste
40 g red pepper, sliced
1/2 tsp garlic paste
100 g carrot, sliced
1 tsp olive oil
50 g baby sweetcorn, halved
1 tsp vegetable buillion powder

recipes.label: Chicken And Noodle Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 teaspoon peanut oil
2 small red chillies, seeds removed and finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped
⅓ cup (80ml) lime juice
150 g vermicelli rice noodles
2 cooked chicken breast fillets, thinly sliced
2 Lebanese cucumbers, thinly sliced
½ cup mint leaves, halved lengthwise

recipes.label: Tahini Noodle Toss
recipes.ingredients:
250 g/9oz wholewheat noodles
4 spring onions, finely sliced
1 large garlic clove, finely chopped
1 chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
4 tablespoons of tahini paste
1 tablespoon of sunflower oil
1 tablespoon of soya sauce
1 tablespoon of oyster sauce
1 tablespoon of rice wine vinegar
1 teaspoon of sesame oil
A good handful of bean sprouts
Toasted sesame seeds
A small handful of coriander, freshly chopped

recipes.label: Easy Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
85.0g leftover cooked chicken , shredded
juice 1 lime
2 tsp soy sauce and 2 tsp sugar
2 spring onions , sliced, to serve
1 garlic clove , grated
150.0g pack straight-to-wok noodles (or use 85g/3oz dried, cooked according to pack instructions)
small piece fresh root ginger , grated
500.0ml low salt vegetable stock (from a cube is fine)
handful mixed vegetables (try beansprouts, sweetcorn, sliced carrot and mangetout)

recipes.label: Chinese Noodles With Tofu & Hazelnuts
recipes.ingredients:
3.0 tbsp Chinese yellow beans sauce
2.0 tbsp olive oil
349 g pack silken tofu , cut into cubes
handful toasted hazelnuts , roughly chopped
1 red chilli , seeded and finely chopped
250 g packet medium egg noodle
handful coriander , roughly chopped
300.0g mangetout

recipes.label: Noodle Pudding with Apple
recipes.ingredients:
¾ cup (100 g) currants or raisins, black or golden
4 tablespoons rum
½ lb (250 g) medium egg noodles
Salt
3 eggs
2/3 cup (125 g) sugar
¾ cup (75 g) walnuts or almonds, coarsely chopped
Zest of 1 orange or 1 lemon
4 tart apples, such as Granny Smiths
Juice of ½ lemon

recipes.label: Savory Noodle Kugel
recipes.ingredients:
8 ounces egg noodles, cooked al dente according to the package directions, rinsed and cooled
3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
2 large eggs, lightly beaten
1 cup organic sour cream
1/2 cup organic cottage cheese
1 cup gruyere cheese, grated, divided into half cup portions
3 tablespoons fresh chives, minced
kosher salt and fresh ground white pepper
1/2 cup plain bread crumbs, mixed with a tablespoon of unsalted butter and seasoned with salt and pepper

recipes.label: Miso Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 tablespoon white miso
1 tablespoon warm water
1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil
1/2 small garlic clove, grated
1/3 cup thinly sliced red cabbage
1/2 cup cooked flat brown rice (pad Thai) noodles (about 1 oz. uncooked)
2 shiitake mushroom caps, thinly sliced
1 tablespoon chopped green onions
4 thin slices red jalapeño
1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 hard-cooked large egg

recipes.label: Noodle Kugel recipes
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter, melted, plus more for dish
coarse salt
1 pound broad egg noodles
6 large eggs
2 cups (16 ounces) sour cream, room temperature
1 cup sugar
12 ounces cream cheese, room temperature
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
2 large Granny Smith apples, (about 12 ounces total), peeled, cored, and chopped into 1/2-inch pieces (about 3 cups)

recipes.label: Ramen Noodle Frittata
recipes.ingredients:
1 3-ounce package ramen noodles (seasoning packet discarded)
1 1/2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil
2 tablespoons vegetable oil
8 ounces ground chicken
1 tablespoon oyster sauce
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
2 cups shredded coleslaw mix
6 scallions, chopped
8 large eggs
2 tablespoons pickled ginger, sliced into thin strips
12 ounces baby bok choy, halved lengthwise

recipes.label: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
Olive oil, for frying
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 carrots, peeled, halved and sliced crosswise
2 stalks celery, thinly sliced
1 medium onion, finely diced
1 clove garlic, grated
3/4 teaspoon ground thyme
2 cups low-sodium chicken broth
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 cups cooked egg noodles
2 to 3 tablespoons finely minced fresh parsley

recipes.label: Prawn & Herb Noodle Salad
recipes.ingredients:
tbsp olive oil
1 crushed garlic clove
100.0g medium dried rice noodles
1 small cucumber
400.0g cooked, peeled tiger prawns
a small handful each of coriander and mint leaves
finely grated zest and juice of a lime

recipes.label: Peach Noodle Kugel
recipes.ingredients:
16 ounces weight Egg Noodles, Cooked For Half The Cooking Time
1/4 cup Butter
Zest Of One Lemon
3/4 cup Sugar
1 1/2 tsp Cinnamon
1 1/2 tsp Salt
4 whole Eggs Beaten
1 1/2 can 20 To 22 Ounces Total Peach Halves, Chopped Into Large Chunks
2 cups Whole Milk
2 cups Corn Flakes, Slightly Crushed
1/4 cup Butter, Melted
1/4 cup Brown Sugar

recipes.label: Egg-Drop Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
½ tsp. salt
3 package ramen noodles
10½ c. chicken broth
1 piece ginger
3 clove garlic
1 tbsp. soy sauce
6 small scallions
3 large eggs
1 tbsp. sesame oil

recipes.label: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
1 large onion, chopped
3-pound chicken, in parts or 3 pounds chicken pieces of your choice
8 cups water
1 bay leaf
2 teaspoons table salt
Freshly ground black pepper
1 large carrot, diced (1/3-inch)
1 medium parsnip, diced (1/3-inch) (optional)
1 large celery stalk, diced (1/3-inch)
3 ounces dried egg noodles, I prefer wide ones
1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill or flat-leaf parsley

recipes.label: Chicken noodle soup
recipes.ingredients:
3 chicken carcasses, plus 6 chicken drumsticks
2.5 litres/4 pints 8fl oz water
3 carrots, peeled, chopped
2 celery stalks, trimmed, chopped
1 large leek, trimmed, sliced
2 large onions, peeled, chopped
2 fresh bay leaves
1 small bunch fresh thyme
1 tsp black peppercorns
1 tsp salt flakes
150g/5oz rice noodles
1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley
1-2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to serve

recipes.label: Ginger & Chicken Noodles
recipes.ingredients:
2 bunches spring onion , cut into diagonal strips
3.0 tbsp soy sauce
100.0g fresh root ginger , peeled and cut into small slithers
200.0ml saké or dry sherry
3.0 tbsp vegetable oil
3 eggs
6 garlic cloves , finely sliced
4 skinless boneless chicken breast fillets
3 x 200g packs straight-to-wok noodle

recipes.label: Gingery shiitake noodles
recipes.ingredients:
375g pack medium dried egg noodle
couple dashes toasted sesame oil
2 tbsp groundnut oil
finger-length piece fresh root ginger, grated
300g fresh shiitake mushroom, sliced
8 spring onion, cut into thirds, then thinly sliced into lengthways strips

2 tbsp light soy sauce

recipes.label: Ramen Chicken Noodle
recipes.ingredients:
1 tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil
2 bell peppers, chopped

1/2 c. Thinly sliced green onions
3 garlic cloves, minced
kosher salt
Freshly ground black pepper

Juice of 1 lime, plus lime wedges for serving

recipes.label: Prawn & Ginger Noodle Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 lime , juiced
250.0g large, cooked, peeled prawns
1 small mango , peeled and sliced
4.0 tbsp light soy sauce
250.0g pack rice noodles
a large bunch of fresh coriander , roughly chopped
